dia.str: Do you know anything about the Packs, Thurza?

Terrible things are happening. I heard a child's cry and when I ran out I saw the flames. I ran for help as fast as I could. They disappeared. Not even a corpse. After the smoke faded away I entered the remains of their home. I haven't told anyone yet, but I found something.
What have you found, Thurza? Why haven't you showed it to anyone?
My husband is out on a hunt. I will show him what I found before I show anyone else. He would be really mad if I showed it to someone before him.
But the lives of the Packs might be in danger! If you found something, you must show it to me.
You have to understand that time is of the essence now. Please Thurza!
It's really heavy. There is writing on it but I can't read it. I think it was written in an ancient language. If it helps, you can have it. Please don't tell my husband that I gave it to you.
What can this be? I will show it to my grandfather, he might know more. I won't tell anyone that you found this. I hope this will help us find them.
